name: Verify user should able to view reports in cancelled Policy report when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user should able to view reports in cancelled Policy report when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction ({cancellationtype=Flat, cancellationreason=Duplicate coverage})

children.description: Given Underwriter has ability to create Policy for LOB Workers Compensation
When Underwriter creates WK policy
Then Policy created successfully
Given user has a WK Policy
And Cancellation is performed on policy for transaction effective date 06/19/2022
And with cancellation type Flat and cancellation reason Duplicate coverage
When user searches for the policy in cancelled Policy report
Then policy should be appeared in cancelled report

testSteps.description: 2: Verify user should able to view reports in cancelled Policy report when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction ({cancellationtype=short, cancellationreason=Coverage Placed With Another Carrier})

children.description: Given Underwriter has ability to create Policy for LOB Workers Compensation
When Underwriter creates WK policy
Then Policy created successfully
Given user has a WK Policy
And Cancellation is performed on policy for transaction effective date 06/19/2022
And with cancellation type short and cancellation reason Coverage Placed With Another Carrier
When user searches for the policy in cancelled Policy report
Then policy should be appeared in cancelled report

testSteps.description: 3: Verify user should able to view reports in cancelled Policy report when transaction date is greater than system date for cancellation transaction ({cancellationtype=Pro rata, cancellationreason=Completed Operations})

children.description: Given Underwriter has ability to create Policy for LOB Workers Compensation
